title: 1977 Taça de Portugal Final
text: The 1977 Taça de Portugal Final was the final match of the 1976–77 Taça de Portugal, the 37th season of the <a href="Ta%C3%A7a%20de%20Portugal">Taça de Portugal</a>, the premier Portuguese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> cup competition organized by the <a href="Portuguese%20Football%20Federation">Portuguese Football Federation</a> (FPF). The match was played on 18 May 1977 at the <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20das%20Antas">Estádio das Antas</a> in <a href="Porto">Porto</a>, and opposed two Primeira Liga sides: <a href="S.C.%20Braga">Braga</a> and <a href="F.C.%20Porto">Porto</a>. Porto defeated Braga 1–0 to claim the Taça de Portugal for a fourth time.
